author: cnbc.com
title: Dreyfus High Yield Strategies Fund Declares Dividend
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- On March 27, 2018, the Board of Trustees of Dreyfus High Yield Strategies Fund (NYSE:DHF) declared from net investment income a monthly cash dividend of $0.0235 per share of beneficial interest, payable on April 25, 2018 to shareholders of record at the close of business on April 11, 2018. The ex-dividend date is April 10, 2018. The previous dividend declared in February was $0.0235 per share of beneficial interest.
